paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information and penetrance data from a study on familial breast cancer patients in Lebanon.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Breast cancer diagnosed at age 51, family history includes breast cancer in mother at age 63.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: This mutation was identified in a patient diagnosed at the age of 51 years and was considered as a truncating mutation.

functional_data.summary: Deletion leading to a frameshift and a stop codon.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, family history includes breast cancer.
key_quotes: This mutation was identified in a patient diagnosed at the age of 51 years and was considered as a truncating mutation.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Breast cancer diagnosed at age 33, family history includes breast cancer diagnosis of the father and the paternal aunt.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The second mutation is at position c.9485-1 G > A leading to exon 26 skipping.

functional_data.summary: Disrupts an acceptor splice site consensus sequence.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, family history includes breast cancer.
key_quotes: The second mutation is at position c.9485-1 G > A leading to exon 26 skipping.

tables_processed.table_caption: Sequence variants identified in the BRCA2 gene

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants and penetrance data were successfully extracted.
